thread.title: SustainCo Inc. Announces Purchase of Common Shares by CEO

author: cnbc.com
title: SustainCo Inc. Announces Purchase of Common Shares by CEO
text:
TORONTO, March 07, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- SustainCo Inc. (the “Company” or “SustainCo”) (TSXV:SMS) announces in accordance with the requirements of Section 3.1 of National Instrument 62-103 Skyvest Aviation Inc. ("Skyvest") a company that is controlled by Emlyn David, on March 7, 2018 acquired 2,646,566 common shares (the “Shares”) of SustainCo Inc. Skyvest now owns 8,979,899 Shares of SustainCo, or approximately 56.92% of the current issued and outstanding Shares of SustainCo.
Skyvest acquired 2,646,566 Shares of SustainCo pursuant to private agreements made with five persons. Immediately prior to the acquisition, Emlyn David directly and indirectly controlled 7,768,306 Shares. Subsequent to the transaction Emlyn David directly and indirectly controls 10,414,872 Shares of SustainCo, or approximately 66.01% of the current issued and outstanding Shares of the Company.
Skyvest acquired the Shares for investment purposes and may acquire additional securities or dispose of existing securities of SustainCo in the market or privately, from time to time as circumstances warrant.
A copy of the early warning report filed by Skyvest in connection with this acquisition is available on the SEDAR website at www.sedar.com .

About SustainCo Inc.
SustainCo conducts its operations through two wholly-owned subsidiaries, Clean Energy Developments Corp. (“CleanEnergy”) and VCI CONTROLS Inc. (“VCI” or “VCI CONTROLS”).
CleanEnergy is a Canadian industry leading geoexchange company that provides heating and cooling solutions for residential and commercial buildings using energy from the earth. It provides a complete energy solution and is able to provide engineering and design, geo installation, equipment and control systems as well as manage the complete project.
VCI is a leading supplier of building technologies and services that improve comfort, safety, energy efficiency, and occupant productivity. It is an industry leader in the development of intelligent building technology, including the integration of all building systems utilizing the latest in communications technologies and standards. VCI's business focuses on digital controls and mechanical services, performance monitoring, and energy efficiency solutions.
With headquarters in Toronto, SustainCo has offices across Canada including, Halifax, Montreal, Pembroke, Ottawa, and Vaughan. For more information, visit www.sustainco.ca .
